title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS ProServe's Game-Changing Partnership with Sports Customers (SPF205)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS ProServe 与体育客户的颠覆性合作伙伴关系 (SPF205)
abstract: Discover how AWS Professional Services helps sports media companies revolutionize fan engagement through innovative audio data analysis solutions. Learn how we tackle the challenges of implementing scalable audio processing architectures while maintaining real-time performance and cost efficiency. This session reveals our strategies for serverless architecture excellence, AI/ML integration, and accelerated innovation cycles. Perfect for technical leaders seeking insights into transforming media workflows through AWS expertise. Key Takeaways: Serverless audio processing strategies for sports media • AI/ML techniques for automated content detection • Real-world fan engagement transformation examples
abstract_cn: 了解AWS专业服务如何通过创新的音频数据分析解决方案帮助体育媒体公司彻底改变粉丝互动体验。了解我们如何应对实施可扩展音频处理架构的挑战，同时保持实时性能和成本效益。本次会议揭示了我们在无服务器架构卓越性、AI/ML集成和加速创新周期方面的策略。非常适合希望通过AWS专业知识深入了解媒体工作流程转型的技术领导者。主要收获：体育媒体的无服务器音频处理策略 • 用于自动内容检测的AI/ML技术 • 真实的粉丝互动转型案例

presenter.name: Abhisek Rath
presenter.title: Principal ProServe Account Executive (AWSI Media and Entertainment)
